scripts.setup:tracker: echo '⏭️  Skipping tracker setup on non-Windows platform' && echo '   Tracker is Windows-only and will be built separately'
scripts.check:tracker: cd apps/tracker && (python3 -c "import importlib.util; import sys; missing=[p for p in ['PyQt6','pystray','httpx','pydantic','structlog'] if importlib.util.find_spec(p) is None]; sys.exit(1) if missing and print(f'❌ Missing Python deps: {", ".join(missing)}') else print('✅ Tracker dependencies OK')" 2>/dev/null || python -c "import importlib.util; import sys; missing=[p for p in ['PyQt6','pystray','httpx','pydantic','structlog'] if importlib.util.find_spec(p) is None]; sys.exit(1) if missing and print(f'❌ Missing Python deps: {", ".join(missing)}') else print('✅ Tracker dependencies OK')")
